lyric:
[by:TakeItInUrHeart]
[00:00.59]Help, I lost myself again
[00:07.95]But I remember you (x3)
[00:48.44]Way too many times seen them rack up 15 lines
[00:52.14]Thinking how the **** they okay with ****ing up all they minds
[00:55.48]Now I do the same shit, but I have my reasons why
[01:00.14]Its the only thing that makes me talk, and opens up my eyes
[01:04.56]I won't lie, I miss the nights
[01:07.10]Parties every single night, double cups of hi-tech
[01:11.02]I would sip myself a couple lines
[01:12.96]I pop me a bar, close my eyes, go to the stars
[01:16.50]Wish that I would never come back
[01:18.86]Because living is ****ing hard
[01:20.84]And the summer time was awful, broke my ****ing heart
[01:24.72]I got memories forever
[01:26.64]I had notebooks full of scars
[01:28.72]I got reasons why I ain't made shit, not in a while
[01:32.69]Thinking how the **** I do that shit, can't crack a smile
[01:36.60]I say every tape I put out is my last
[01:39.80]Because I don't like sitting here thinking about the past
[01:43.42]The cool summer nights, when the moon rolled passed
[01:47.98]The feelings we would get that we knew wouldn't last
[01:53.96]Help, I lost myself again
[02:01.91]But I remember you (x2)
tlyric:
[by:死於心碎]
[00:00.59]救我，我再次迷失了自我
[00:07.95]可我仍记得你
[00:48.44]总是只有15种方法
[00:52.14]想想如何搞砸他们的想法
[00:55.48]我做同样的事情但我有我的原因
[01:00.14]这是唯一能让我不在沉默，睁开眼睛的东西
[01:04.56]我没说谎，我思念那个夜晚
[01:07.10]每个晚会，两杯高科技（？）
[01:11.02]我会喝掉它们
[01:12.96]在酒吧里，闭上双眼，去看星辰
[01:16.50]希望那个自己再不会回来
[01:18.86]生活太苦了
[01:20.84]糟糕的夏天让我心碎
[01:24.72]我不会忘记
[01:26.64]我的笔记本伤痕累累
[01:28.72]我不止一次有不让自己成为废物的理由
[01:32.69]我能怎么办，我很难受
[01:36.60]每一盘磁带我都说是最后一盘
[01:39.80]因为我不想回到过去
[01:43.42]冰冷的夏夜，月亮缓缓行过
[01:47.98]其实早就知道我们之间不会长久
[01:53.96]救我，我再次迷失了自我
[02:01.91]可我仍记得你
